gmacsr 0.1
  • Reference

Run gmacs.exe

Source: R/gmacs_do_exe.R
gmacs_do_exe.Rd

Run gmacs.exe and do iterative reweighing of Francis weights

gmacs_do_exe(
  gmacs.dat,
  pin = F,
  wait = T,
  reweight = F,
  level = 0.001,
  max_iter = 100,
  reweight_only = F
)

Arguments

gmacs.dat

File path to gmacs.dat file

pin

T/F use pin file. Default = F.

wait

Passed to shell(): a logical (not NA) indicating whether the R interpreter should wait for the command to finish, or run it asynchronously.

reweight

T/F tune Francis weights. Default = F.

level

Level of convergence for Francis weights. Default = 0.001.

max_iter

Maximum iterations for tuning Francis weights. Default = 100.

reweight_only

T/F do initial GMACS run (F) or skip to iterative reweighting (T).

Value

Run GMACS, standard GMACS output files.

Examples

gmacs_do_exe(gmacs.dat = "./AIGKC/models/2024/may/EAG/23.1b/gmacs.dat")
#> Error in setwd(dir): cannot change working directory
